name: Towering Yoga Masters
description:
This is my first game ever! It's called Towering Yoga Masters.

The graphics may appear somewhat child-friendly but don't be mistaken, this game is still a challenge. Your aim is to stack 10 different people in yoga positions into a beautiful tower without anybody falling off and hitting the floor. In version 1 there are two formations for you to complete. More may be added depending on how many plays the game gets on the various platforms it's submitted to.

Game by Satch games.

Thanks for checking the game out today.
